title: PYROCLASTIC Trailer Music Pack
description: Powerful Epic Trailer Music Pack, high-quality songs with orchestra and choirs. 20 tracks (10 unique with choirs + 10 non choir version).
longDescription:
LISTEN NOW

Feel free to listen before you buy :)

EPIC, CHORAL, RISING and very intense POWERFUL songs.


PYROCLASTIC is specially created for trailers, spots, advertisements, game scenes…

The pack includes 20 tracks (10 unique with choirs + 10 non choir version).

Thanks for submitting your feedback and rating.

technicalDetails:
★ Features:

  •  10 Unique songs with Choir + 10 Non Choir version (20 tracks)
  •  40:54 Minutes of Total Audio (including both versions)
  •  20:27 Minutes of Unique Songs
  • WAV and CUE Assets

Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit / Stereo

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 40:54

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://docs.unrealengine.com/5.0/en-US/working-with-audio-in-unreal-engine/
